Header: No money if Provincial Council’s failed to adhere by the national policy- Edu Min.
Content: Money allowances will not be given to Provincial Councils that do not adhere by the ‘Nearest school- the best school’ project’, Minister of Education Akila Viraj Kariyawasam said. He made this comment during the opening of a three story building at the U. B. Wanninayake National School in Galgamuwa. He also added that retired school teachers will be hired as a temporary solution to teacher shortage.
